Cliff Notes
Marketer Software Engineer

I am a passionate developer with a strong desire to learn and grow. I have extensive hands-on experience with a diverse range of tools, libraries, and frameworks, including but not limited to React, Ruby on Rails, Node.js, Django, Flask, PostgreSQL, Next.js, jQuery, and AWS. I am also skilled in testing frameworks such as Jest and Playwright, and proficient with Git and GitHub.

I'm open to full-time, part-time, and contract work. Check out my resume. If you think we'd be a good fit, or want to learn more about me, get in touch at jack.norquist@outlook.com.

Background
Full Stack Engineer

Born and raised in Minnesota, I graduated from UMD Duluth in 2021 with a degree in marketing and economics. A few years later I was introduced to software engineering by random luck of helping fix a broken WordPress plugin. I quickly realized the limitless possibilites the field has, the mental stimilation that it provides, and the pleasure I found in working with it. I began self learning the fundamentals on the side and I couldn't get enough.

After self studying for a year I decided that software engineering was the career I wanted. I enrolled in a full-stack web development bootcamp. There I learned programming in a professional environment, fundementals of the web, and how to leverage the many libraries, frameworks, and tools available to programmers.

Interests and Hobbies

For me, there's nothing a day outside can't fix. I love spending time outdoors through camping, hunting, and fishing most of all. I have fishing poles in my vehicle at all times and I usually can't resist throwing a line in if I see water that may hold a fish. My bucket list fish is a 30inch walleye!

If I'm not outside during my free time, I'll likely be at the gym, playing basketball, or watching football (Skol Vikings!). No one envies a Minnesota sports fan, but I'm proud to be one, and my optimistic delusion restarts at the beginning of every season.

Now

I'm looking for a job that can leverage my skills and passion for software engineering. I stay up to date on the latest technologies, take pride in my work, and am committed to delivering high-quality solutions. I'm eager to conribute to a team with innovative projects and goals.

Please reach out at jack.norquist@outlook.com to get in touch.

Projects

Fiske

Tech: Ruby on Rails, React, SQL, AWS, Typescript

A social media webapp made with Ruby on Rails and React. See live site here. (can take up to a minute for backend to spin up)

Max Retirement Contributions Calculator

Tech: PHP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, jQuery

This tool calculates and presents the maximum contributions a sole proprietor can make across various retirement plans.

Product Catalog

Tech: Python, Selenium, AWS, SQL, Next.js, React, Javascript, HTML, CSS

This project visuallizes hundreds of products accross several different manufacturers. The products were obtained through custom web scraping with selenium and database management with sql. The front end is delivered through Next.js.

A workout app used to browse workouts, create a workout schedule, and track your progress. See code and instructions to run here.
